reviews.review_msg: I would say that Ryan has been my best prof so far at SFU. I thought this class would be one of my driest classes out of all my other classes, turned out to be the one I looked the most forward to. He made environmental health science INTERESTING. Wish he taught more classes!

Dr. Allen is one of the top professors in the HSCI faculty! He is hilarious and makes the lecture very interesting so it's impossible to fall asleep in his class (even though it's at 8:30am). He is always there during office hours and makes time for you if you can't make them! Amazing professor, I would definitely take any of his classes again
